summary: AN ORDINANCE granting Limantzakis Properties No. 1, LLC permission to maintain and operate a pedestrian skybridge over and across the alley, parallel to Northeast 45th Street and Northeast 47th Street between University Way Northeast and 15th Avenue Northeast in Block 1, University Heights Addition, and to maintain and operate certain window protrusions over a portion of University Way Northeast abutting Lots 19 and 20, Block 1, University Heights Addition, for a ten-year term, renewable for two successive ten-year terms; specifying the conditions under which this permit is granted; and providing for acceptance of the permit and conditions.
